thread.title: Laura suarez garcia
thread.title_full: TrustedHousesitters reviewed by Laura suarez garcia

author: Laura suarez garcia
title: Laura suarez garcia
text: I enjoyed a lot my stay with Willow, Poppy and Chesney. All of them very nice and well behaved cats :)) I also felt very comfortable in Helen's house, she made things very easy and made sure I was ok with everything. Looking forward to the next house sitting experience!
